website_summaries.verdict: The cycling backpack to choose if you want better aerodynamics and a slimmer profile.
pros: Nylon mesh construction is tear resistant to keep small items from falling out while riding
Small front pockets make it easy to store items like keys and wallets in a clear, accessible spot
cons: The interior compartment is smaller than a normal school or college-size backpack

customer_reviews.title: THIS PACKPACK SAVED MY @SS
customer_reviews.text: This back back is a great buy. This 20$ amazon back pack saved my @** the first time I used it. I purchased this to use while trail riding my dirtbike. I went out for a rip on my bike and ended up crossing a river. Long story short I didn't make it. Me, my bike and this back pack witch contained my phone wallet and keys were all fully submerged in water. I did some pricey damage to my bike but because this back pack is water proof my phone wallet and keys were perfectly dry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Replaced waist pack for biking.
customer_reviews.text: My new waist pack kept slipping down while riding my bike, so I went with this light backpack. It doesn't overheat my back, it stores lots of stuff, and doesn't move around while biking. Very price worthy.
customer_reviews.author: Hallas C. Midgette

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed that the front zipper broke within the first week ...
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed that the front zipper broke within the first week of using it. However, I have continued to just use the larger compartment, and bike everywhere with it. You pay for the quality you get, but it certainly is not a bad deal. I am able to fit my bike lock, a sweatshirt, and my camera, which is all I need for my rides. Adjustable straps and front buckle make it easy to carry on your back with out discomfort. Just about as light weight as material can get, which is also a plus. Overall, not a bad purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Brodeur

customer_reviews.title: Great little hiking bag!
customer_reviews.text: This bag ended up slightly smaller than I anticipated, but the specs are there, so I should have known! The material is nice and thin, but durable. The bag is super lightweight. To give you an idea of size, it can hold a water bottle and light jacket in the main compartment. The smaller front pocket will hold your keys, phone and a snack bar (this is what I took hiking the 1st time I used it). Perfect for my needs!
customer_reviews.author: Karbeans

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and convenient
customer_reviews.text: I'm 70 and wanted a light, small pack for carrying essentials when I hike. This is dandy. I can carry a water bottle and jacket and id, plus my phone. It's easy to put on and takes the strain off my shoulders. The price was reasonable and I've recommended it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Good, small pack
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed in terms of size. Due to the small volume and layout of the main pocket, though, the water bladder pushes other items down or out, so it feels bulky and a bit awkward if you pack it full. Perfect for tools, tube, and snacks for a medium length ride.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small, compact for short hikes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use for short hikes that last 2-3 hours. It's small to carry just the essentials. In the main compartment I purchased a 32 oz water bottle. The small zipper compartment, I put keys, phone and wallet. One thing is don't tug too hard on the chest strap or it will come off. It can be put back on but it's a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Earl F S

customer_reviews.title: Small & lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Nice lightweight bag for biking or afternoon out. Held my phone, small wallet, couple of snack bars and water bottle. Not sure how well it will hold up but it wasn't very expensive. Don't love the color options... wish they offered a purple or pink.
customer_reviews.author: klsamazon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for for mountain biking. The two straps.... chest and waist help keep it in place. Lots of compartments. Excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy I

customer_reviews.title: So cool! Perfect size and fit for my 7 year ...
customer_reviews.text: So cool! Perfect size and fit for my 7 year old who had a hard time riding his bike with his bigger back pack. I also REALLY like the white "X" shaped logo on the back for visibility and safety. Well done; we love it.
customer_reviews.author: Decoysgrl

customer_reviews.title: Updated - from would to wouldn't... anymore
customer_reviews.text: I've order 3 of these bags. The first one lasted 3 years and I used it ALL the time. The second one was for a friend so I'm not sure how hers is holding up. The 3rd one I purchased to replace my original one. I've had it maybe 3 months and both zippers have already frayed and started coming apart. I don't know if it's a fluke but I'm definitely not happy and would no longer recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Tay

customer_reviews.title: Serves it's purpose
customer_reviews.text: I got this to carry 2 water bottles and small personal items when biking with friends and family. It's lightweight and doesn't shift/bounce around when biking.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Velasquez

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Good construction. Small but perfect for those overnight rides on my road bike. Thank you Santa!
customer_reviews.author: T. Abate

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love this mini back back. Use it for hiking a lot & it looks small but I could fit in a lot of stuff inside haha great material doesn't feel cheap compared to my sister's Camel branded one
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: It's very small which is fine with me but if you want to put a ...
customer_reviews.text: I use it in cold weather to offload layers when I get hot or if the temperature goes up. It's very small which is fine with me but if you want to put a lot of stuff other than clothing then get something bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Fits and wears comfortably. I put my ipad in it and 2-3 ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits and wears comfortably. I put my ipad in it and 2-3 bottles of water for short rides. For longer rides I can fit 5-6 bottles of water. On a 40 mile ride the pack remain comfortable for the entire ride.
customer_reviews.author: jka

customer_reviews.title: Very nice little hydration pack
customer_reviews.text: Obviously inexpensive. Nice and lightweight. Zippers work well even though they are small. Nice buckle on strap on the front. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: J. Killingbeck

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Light, hung high on the back. Wish a bit more room for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Chuong Ta

customer_reviews.title: Cycle friendly, durable?
customer_reviews.text: Some kind of silicone sealant is peeling off the bottom after a month of use. Material is still intact though. Overall. I don’t regret the buy.
customer_reviews.author: John R.

customer_reviews.title: Love this backpack
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack! I use it for hiking and love it. It's comfortable, cute and holds water and my other necessities perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for running
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for running! You can't fit a whole lot in it, but enough room for a few small items. I am unable to fit my work laptop inside, but I would rather not jog with it anyways. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great for day hikes
customer_reviews.text: This was a wonderful pack to have while doing short hikes through Moab. I could fit my 40 oz hydroflask in the main compartment along with plenty of snacks. The small compartment in the front was good for keeping my phone, pocket knife, and sunscreen. It also was great for cycling around town. I look forward to bringing it with me on more adventures.
customer_reviews.author: A.m.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable bicycle pack
customer_reviews.text: Had a few of these. Very comfortable for a bicycle bike pack. Not very spacious but enough for day rides
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works well, if you are looking for a ...
customer_reviews.text: It works well, if you are looking for a smaller pack. I can use this when I run, which was the reason I purchsed it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Small Backpack
customer_reviews.text: Good quality lightweight back pack. Use to hold odds and ends, like wallet and cell phone, registration...etc when riding our motorcycle and ATV. Good quality zippers and fasteners. Material is sturdy but lightweight. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: NW1964

customer_reviews.title: good for hiking or biking, not much space in the backpack
customer_reviews.text: easy to zip up and down, durable material, It is uncomfortable when stuff to the max with materials
customer_reviews.author: Montejano Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It really comes in handle when I go to the gym, go to run trails, or the lake.
customer_reviews.author: Rene J Pastrano

customer_reviews.title: Great Build and Continues to Hold Up
customer_reviews.text: First biking backpack and very pleased with the purchase. Only holds small items which is needed for speed routes.
customer_reviews.author: E. Bell

customer_reviews.title: Great little pack
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. It sits against my back comfortably and securely. I hardly know I'm wearing it. No complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: Choosy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: bike backpack
customer_reviews.text: nice & small for biking but large enough for gear, clothes, food.
customer_reviews.author: sally

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Straps are a little tight around the chest, but overall it’s a pretty good product.
customer_reviews.author: FuzzyUsh

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: No hole for drinking tube for water bladder. Behind back 'mesh' is cheap padding material.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Drevik

customer_reviews.title: love this littel bag
customer_reviews.text: wow, love this littel bag, every where I go I get compliment.
customer_reviews.author: Garth L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I was even allowed to use it at moonrise festival!
customer_reviews.author: Quonte S.

customer_reviews.title: Great pack for biking
customer_reviews.text: Great pack for biking ! Doesn't come with a bladder but even has Straps for the straw. Also fits down your back instead of interfering with your shoulder movement .
customer_reviews.author: Dom

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size to carry a few items for a bike ride or hike. Light. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: mw00232

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So in love with the bag it was actually a gift and the owner was soooo pleased
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: West Biking Cycling Mini Bicycle Backpack Bike Bag Outdoor Sports Rucksack For Camping Hiking Running Daypacks
feature_bullets: Comfortable, padded air-mesh back and PE foam for extra back support
Breathable and adjustable mesh shoulder straps
High utilization rate storage space---Be easily put some daily necessities, clothes and sporting goods; Practical small front pocket,suitable for storing small articles such as mobile phone
Convenient for all hiking,camping,climbing,traveling cycling outdoor activities
